name: WholeDome
description:
FEATURES

• Team Death Match
• Local Multiplayer
• Wifi-Hotspot Multiplayer
• Play with your friend without internet
• Action Game
• Shooter Game

DETAILS

WholeDome game is a multiplayer Lan-Wifi Game . You can player this game with your friend without Internet. it is a shooter game which have five types of gun available to play and shoot your enemies. Play this game with your friend when you have no internet . Just Open your Hotspot and host the game and tell your friend to connect to your hotspot and join the game. One of the best local Multiplayer game. Play and have fun.
